name: Bug in The System
description: The Tachyon Reactor, first of its kind has been abandoned after what appeared to be a routine evacuation test. Left in the building, sleeping through the alarm in his janitorial supply closet, The Janitor awakens to hear a distress call come from his old walkie-talkie. It's his boss in the facility! The mysterious Dr. Faust, who warns him of impending doom as a Bug in the System has taken over and released the security drones. What does it seek to gain? In this adventure you will play as The Janitor as he makes his way throughout the facility, destroying robots with the power of his skull and using their disembodied arms against them to stop a nuclear tachyon reactor from destroying the surrounding area- to stop a nuclear tachyon reactor from destroying the surrounding area- to stop - -a s-d-fa ----
